mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO integral_board_tb ( type, time_type, integral, record_time, create_date, update_date, account_id ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{timeType}, #{integral}, #{recordTime}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{accountId} )
mapper.update:

type=#{type},
time_type=#{timeType},
integral=#{integral},
record_time=#{recordTime},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
account_id=#{accountId},
